tool_description: Shopee product search api & product details api
name: ShopeeApi
title: ShopeeApi

api_list.name: Get products from sellerID and categoryID
api_list.description:
Getting products from given sellerID and categoryID.

If the categoryID is not provided it will fetch from any category from sellerID

api_list.name: Get categories from sellerID
api_list.description: Getting product categories from seller ID

api_list.name: Search products

optional_parameters.name: sellerID
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Filter search product by seller/shop ID

api_list.name: Get Product details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopeeapi2.p.rapidapi.com/id/Min-order-2pcs-Kentang-Mustofa-100g-Kering-Kentang-Kripik-Kentang-Kentang-Garing-i.179967476.7583210867"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopeeapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shopeeapi2.p.rapidapi.com/{region}/{path}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopeeapi2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
